```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
x = rep(c(0, 5), 5)
xend = rev(x)
y = seq(0, 50, 5)
yend = seq(5, 50, 5)

library(dplyr)

df <- data.frame(x = rep(c(0, 0.5), length = 11),
                 y = seq(0, 50, 5),
                 xend = rep(c(0.5, 0), length = 11),
                 yend = seq(5, 55, 5)) %>% 
  mutate(id = row_number())
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(df) +
  geom_path(
       aes(x = x,
           xend = xend,
           y = y, yend = yend)) +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 0.25, 
                   xend = 0.25,
                y = 0.25,
                yend = 50),
            size = 1,
            color = "black") +
  geom_point(aes(x = xend, y = yend)) +
  scale_x_continuous(limits = c(0, 0.5),
                     breaks = c(0, 0.5))
```
